title: Apollonion Palace
keywords: paramana, work, project, Apollonion Palace website, design & development
description: Τhe website of Apollonion Palace was designed and developed by Paramana.com
maintext:
Apollonion Palace is a luxury hotel in Syros. The web design's starting points were the logo and the hotel's business card.

This project's challenge was the construction of a smart system for online bookings, specifiaclly designed for the needs of the hotel.

We also designed the administration part of the booking system, with many functionalities such as direct notifications through e-mail, client information management, price editing, management and publication of offers e.t.c.

The website is multilingual; now supporting four languages and is designed carefully for future CMS implementation for text editing and photo management.
